recipes.label: A Bittersweet Request
recipes.startdescription:
As I leave the club, Mr. Agdistis invites me to join him.

"When we first met, I noticed something torn in you. Your soul aches, wounded, bleeding into the world like an ink on the waters surface. Some of these wounds...I know about them. Though yours is a birthwound and mine a broken cog..."

"I knew someone, once. She changed my life, but not how she was meant to."

Agdistis trails off as his eyes gaze into the past.

"At the most important time, I couldn't follow through. Since then I cannot not go forward, nor can I let go. She holds my heart, instead of who it was promised to. And now...I need you to do this for me."

recipes.description:
He hands me a little bundle wrapped in red satin cloth.

"Please, let go of this memory for me, at the heart of a violent storm. Let it be utterly mangled and consumed by the waves. Help me break this stasis I have stayed in for so long. I hope it will illuminate your own next step. Please take it."
